JLRs method (probably fixed)
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Raising/Training Methods: Assorted Other Specialty Methods: JLRs method (probably fixed)
By JLR on Wednesday, June 19, 2002 - 03:35 pm:

JLRs Method (probably fixed)

STEP 1. Are you strapped with about $240,000? Are you some of those people who are not caring about reloading or saving a lot? And are you not caring about form that much?
If you picked yes for these 3 questions then this is the method for you!!!

For best results your monster must like Meat and Tablets!

NOTE : How the Magic Banana Works! The Magic Banana works by gaining 1 week and losing 1 week. If you lose 10 loyalty you just got 1 week of life, but if you gain 10 loyalty you lose 1 week of life.
KEY: Mint Leaf - ML
Nuts Oil - NO Magic banana - MB Smocked Snake - SM
None - candy, SM, Powder, MB. In place of none.
Light Drill - LD
Hard Drill - HD
Meat - Meat
Tablet - Tablet
Rest - Rest STEP 2. You may need a couple of items like a Lump Of Ice, Gemni Pot, Sculpture, Golden Peach, Silver Peach*, Fire Stone*. And For sure you will NEED patience, And to RELOAD a lot.

NOTE : A Golden Peach is found in ParePare Expedition, Silver Peach is found in Elders Cup, and Fire Stone and Silver peach are optional.

STEP 3. RULES FOR STAGE 1 & 2: 1.DO NOT feed your monster any food but Meat and Tablets.
2.DO NOT USE DRUGS, Drugs take away life span!! 3.Do not send your monster on anything until third stage. 4.Save every week before anything.
5.Do not let your monster fail or cheat reload if happens.

STEP 4. STAGE 1
1st month

1st wk None, LD (+10 Fatigue, +10 Stress) = (+10 F,+10 S)
2nd wk ML, LD (+10 Fatigue, +5 Stress, -50% Stress) = (+20 F, +18 S)
3rd wk ML, LD (+10 Fatigue, +5 Stress, -50% Stress) = (+30 F,+20 S)
4th wk NO, LD (+10 Fatigue , +10 Stress, -28 Fatigue) = (+12 F, +30 S) Feeding : Tablet : Liked (-0 F, -15 S)
Neutral (-0 F, -13 S)
(+12 F, +15/17 S)

2nd month
(+12 Fatigue, +12/14 Stress from last month)
1st wk None, LD (+10 Fatigue, +10 Stress) = (+22 F, +22/24 S)
2nd wk ML, LD (+10 Fatigue, +5 Stress, -50% Stress) = (+15 F, +24/26 S)
3rd wk ML, LD (+10 Fatigue, +5 Stress, -50% Stress) = (+25 F, +26/28 S)
4th wk ML, Rest (-33 Fatigue, -7 Stress,-50% Stress) = (+0 F, +13/14 S)
Feeding : Tablet : Liked (-0 F, -15 S)
Neutral (-0 F, -13 S)
(+0 F, +0/1 S)
(REPEAT UNTIL 1ST STAGE IS OVER) (when monster grows up)

STEP 5. STAGE 2
1st month

1st wk None, HD (+15 Fatigue, +24 Stress) = (+15 F, +24 S)
2nd wk ML, HD (+15 Fatigue, +12 Stress, -50% Stress) = (+30 F, +36 S)
3rd wk ML, LD (+10 Fatigue, +5 Stress, -50% Stress) = (+40 F, +42 S)
4th wk ML, Rest (-33 Fatigue, -7 Stress, -50% Stress) = (+7 F, +18 S)
Feeding : Tablet : Liked (-0 F, -15 S)
Neutral (-0 F, -13 S)
(+7 F, +3/5 S)

2nd month
(+7 Fatigue, +3/5Stress from last month)
1st wk NO, LD (+10 Fatigue, +10 Stress, -28 Fatigue) = (+0 F,+13/15S)
2nd wk ML, LD (+10 Fatigue, +5 Stress, -50% Stress) = (+10 F, +19/21 S)
3rd wk ML, HD (+15 Fatigue, +12 Stress, -50% Stress) = (+25 F, +31/33 S)
4th wk ML, Rest (-33 Fatigue, -7 Stress, -50% Stress) = (+0 F, +12/13 S)
Feeding : Tablet : Liked (-0 F, -15 S)
Neutral (-0 F, -13 S)
(+0 F, +0 S)

(REPEAT UNTIL 2ND STAGE IS OVER)

STEP 6: RULES FOR STAGE 3:
1.DO NOT feed your monster any food but Tablets
2.Do not use drugs.
3.When sending monster in battle do not get KO’d or injured. And when battling follow list: D class, B class, S class, And then M-4.
4.Your monster must win all battles if loses at least 2 reload.
STEP 7: STAGE 3 (FINAL STAGE)
1st month (when ever not battling repeat this month until a battle month)

1st wk NO, HD (+15 Fatigue, +24 Stress, -28 Fatigue) = (+0 F, +12 S)
2nd wk ML, HD (+15 Fatigue, +12 Stress, -50% Stress) = (+2 F, +24 S)
3rd wk ML, HD (+15 Fatigue, +12 Stress, -50% Stress) = (+17 F, +48 S)
4th wk ML, Rest (-33 Fatigue, -7 Stress, -50% Stress) = (+0 F, +15 S)
Feeding : Tablet : Liked (-0 F, -15 S)
Neutral (-0 F, -13 S)
(+0 F, +2/0 S)
__________________________________________________________________
1st month (This month is when battling a Tournay)(4th wk)

1st wk None, HD (+15 Fatigue, +24 Stress) = (+15 F, +24 S)
2nd wk NO, HD (+15 Fatigue, +24 Stress, -28 Fatigue) = (+2 F, +48 S)
3rd wk ML, Rest (-33 Fatigue, -7 Stress, -50% Stress) = (+0 F, +21 S)
4th wk NO, Battle (+37 Fatigue, -75 Stress, -28 Fatigue) = (+9 F, +0 S)
Feeding : Meat : Liked (-0 F, -8 S)
Neutral (-0 F, -5 S)
(+9 F, +0 S)

2nd month
(+9 Fatigue from last month)
1st wk ML, HD (+15 Fatigue, +12 Stress, -50% Stress) = (+24 F, +12 S)
2nd wk NO, HD (+15 Fatigue, +24 Stress, -28 Fatigue) = (+11 F, +36 S)
3rd wk ML, HD (+15 Fatigue, +12 Stress, -50% Stress) = (+26 F, +25 S)
4th wk ML, Rest (-33 Fatigue, -7 Stress, -50% Stress) = (+0 F, +9 S)
Feeding : Tablet : Liked (-0 F, -15 S)
Neutral (-0 F, -13 S)
(+0 F, +0 S)
__________________________________________________________________
4th month (This month is a M-4 month)(2nd wk)

1st wk NO, HD (+15 Fatigue, +24 Stress, -28 Fatigue) = (+0 F, +24 S)
2nd wk NO, Battle (+37 Fatigue, -75 Stress, -28 Fatigue) = (+9 F, +0 S)
3rd wk ML, HD (+15 Fatigue, +12 Stress, -50% Stress) = (+15 F, +12 S)
4th wk ML, Rest (-33 Fatigue, -7 Stress, -50% Stress) = (+0 F, +5 S)
Feeding : Meat : Liked (-0 F, -8 S)
Neutral (-0 F, -5 S)
(-0 F, -0 S)

And that is about it!!! A little better!?!?!?
